name: Geometric Decay Width Model
description: Validates the log-linear correlation between particle decay width Gamma and the Topological Stability Index (TSI).

hypothesis.H0: Particle decay width is uncorrelated with the Topological Stability Index (TSI) beyond random chance (p > 0.016666).
hypothesis.H1: Particle decay width is physically determined by topological barriers, following ln(Gamma) = -A * TSI + B, derived from the action barrier height in geometric QFT.

data_requirements.description: Experimental decay widths (PDG) and topological invariants (n, u, s) for all 12 SM particles.

physical_constraints.notes: TSI definition must remain fixed as (n * u / |s|).

test_method: Log-linear regression and Monte Carlo permutation test (N=10,000).
